title: Who Plays with Lewandowski?
description:
The FC crew debate about who will best fit in a front 3 with Robert Lewandowski at Barcelona. Plus, the guys take a look at how Bayern will cope with the loss of the Polish striker and discuss if Raheem Sterling is wrong to refuse to sign a Manchester City jersey.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Who should play alongside Lewandowski at Barcelona; Harry Kane a good fit to replace him at Bayern; should Raheem Sterling refuse to sign a Man City kit
